description_top: Sidur according to the Yemenite rite (with divinations and other astrological notes)
title: Sidur according to the Yemenite rite (with divinations and other astrological notes)
description: Contents: Sidur according to the Yemenite rite (ff. 1v-114r). Divinations and other astrological notes in Judaeo-Arabic and Hebrew, extracted from various sources (ff. 115r-145r).
